definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Study on degradation of methyl orange wastewater by high voltage discharge;
sentences.chinese: 用自放电电压的高低来判定电容器的质量。

sentences.english: Variable capacitor soldering joints made with RG213 coaxial braid.
sentences.chinese: 可变电容器的焊点与RG213同轴电缆编织的连接。

sentences.english: The effect of electrolyte on high frequency electrical property of wet tantalum capacitors was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了电解质对高频液体钽电容器电性能的影响。

sentences.english: It thus acts as a supercapacitor.
sentences.chinese: 因此它的作用相当于一个超级电容器。

sentences.english: Assembling capacitor bank now is used widely in power system.
sentences.chinese: 集合式并联电容器已广泛用于电力系统。

sentences.english: The effect of aging voltage on the capacitance and leakage current of al electrolytic capacitors.
sentences.chinese: 老练电压对铝电解电容器容量和漏电流的影响。

sentences.english: Metallized film capacitors & filters, VDE, UL, TUV approved.
sentences.chinese: 金属化薄膜电容器&滤波器，有VDE等多项认证。

sentences.english: A capacitor is the electrical equivalent of the bucket.
sentences.chinese: 电容器就是吊桶的电子等价物。

sentences.english: Metal nickel powder, its prepn. method, conductive paste and multi-layer ceramic capacitor.
sentences.chinese: 金属镍粉，其制备方法，导电膏和多层陶瓷电容器。

sentences.english: The recent advances of high power low resistance for supercapacitor at home and abroad are reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 综述了国内外高功率内阻超级电容器的最新研究进展。

sentences.english: An ultracapacitor system for an electric vehicle has been implemented.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了采用超级电容器系统的电动汽车用控制器。

sentences.english: To operate at higher voltages, supercapacitors are connected in series.
sentences.chinese: 工作在更高的电压，超级电容器串联连接。

sentences.english: Their common principle is to use the variable capacity in a condenser .
sentences.chinese: 它们的普遍原理是利用电容器的可变电容。

sentences.english: Establish and maintain power capacitor manufacturing process and standards.
sentences.chinese: 建立和维护电力电容器制造过程及标准。

sentences.english: The rubber plug is one of the key factors that influence the capacitor life.
sentences.chinese: 铝电解电容器橡胶塞的质量是影响寿命的关键因素。

definition: rectifier (transforming alternating electric current to direct current)
